sentences.english: The paper editorials always stick to the quick.
sentences.chinese: 该报的评论一向一语中的。

sentences.english: These names get to the heart of the reason behind the two kinds of tests.
sentences.chinese: 这两个名称一语中的地道出了施行这两类测试的原因。

sentences.english: However, your post is spot on.
sentences.chinese: 不过，您的职位是一语中的。
